basics.name: Unnamed
basics.label: Sous Chef
basics.summary: A highly skilled Sous Chef with experience starting at the Hilton Barbados as a commis 1 and has been promoted to Demi Chef de Partie, Chef de partie and Senior Chef de Partie. Currently at the rank of Sous Chef. Has a passion for the Culinary Arts and believes in team engagement. Is a hard working pro active Sous Chef who is very dependable. Is quality focused, resourceful and is seeking to use skills and talent to add to the operation. Is ready and qualified for the next challenge.

work.name: Unnamed Company
work.summary: Responsible for managing 3 restaurants in a hotel consisting of 350 rooms. Trains new team members, writes the rosters for approximately 65 chefs including casuals while managing the payroll budget. Also responsible for facilitating off property functions, assisting in menu writing and doing the costings once the menus are written.
highlights: Employee of the month nominee on 2 occasions at Hilton Barbados

work.name: Fairmont Royal Pavilion
work.summary: Responsible for Breakfast ,lunch , dinner A La Carte Service , interacting with guest on the Action stations.
